discussiontoolsdebug-intro: This page demonstrates how the [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Extension:DiscussionTools DiscussionTools extension] recognises the threads and comments present on the page '''[[:$1]]'''. You may find it useful in debugging issues with the extension or understanding how it works. The same information is available in the [[$2|discussiontoolspageinfo API]].
discussiontools-error-comment-is-transcl: The '{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}' link cannot be used to reply to this comment. To reply, please {{GENDER:|use}} the full page editor by clicking "$1".
discussiontools-newtopic-missing-title: Please provide a title for {{GENDER:|your}} discussion topic. If you click '{{int:discussiontools-replywidget-newtopic}}', your topic will be added without a title.
discussiontools-notification-added-topic: {{PLURAL:$1|One new topic|$1 new topics|100=99+ new topics}} on '$2'.
discussiontools-notification-removed-top: Topic '$4' was archived or removed from $3.
discussiontools-notification-subscribed-: {{PLURAL:$1|One new reply|$1 new replies|100=99+ new replies}} in '$3'.
discussiontools-preference-description:
Enables experimental talk page features:
* [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk_pages_project/Usability Show metadata] about each discussion and enable a new page layout.

You can customise these features in your [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-editing-discussion|preferences]].

Updates will be posted on the [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk_pages_project/Updates talk pages project's updates page].

Please note:
* Over time, new experimental features will be added.
* Some of the features above may not be available at your wiki yet.
discussiontools-replywidget-terms-click: By clicking '$1', {{GENDER:|you}} agree to the terms of use for this wiki.
